name: Candidate.ly
all_locations: New York, NY, USA; Vienna, Vienna, Austria; Remote
long_description: Candidately simplifies the process of sharing candidate resumes between staffing firms and their clients. Instead of relying on email attachments, Candidately offers a collaborative space where staffing firms can submit their top candidates, receive prompt client feedback, track client activity on candidate profiles, and increase the number of successful placements.
one_liner: The digital storefront for staffing and recruiting teams.
